sentences.en: 1.5 million people are in immediate danger of death from starvation.
sentences.cn: 150万人正因饥饿而即将面临死亡的危险。

sentences.en: a fight to the death.
sentences.cn: 战斗到底。

sentences.en: a subject that has been done to death by generations of painters.
sentences.cn: 被世代画家画得让人厌烦的题材。

sentences.en: A wealthy businessman has been found bludgeoned to death.
sentences.cn: 一位富商被发现死于重物连续猛击。

sentences.en: A young man plunged from a sheer rock face to his death.
sentences.cn: 一名男青年从陡峭的岩壁上坠崖身亡。

sentences.en: Bishop Daly said he was devastated by news of the Cardinal's death.
sentences.cn: 戴利主教说他听到红衣主教去世的消息后感到极为震惊和难过。

sentences.en: He scares teams to death with his pace and power.
sentences.cn: 他的速度之快、力量之大让其他队胆战不已。

sentences.en: He was near to death after a car smash.
sentences.cn: 他差点在一场撞车事故中丧命。

sentences.en: His mother's small estate had passed to him after her death.
sentences.cn: 他母亲死后留给他一小笔遗产。

sentences.en: In high school I was scared to death of you.
sentences.cn: 高中时我怕你怕得要命。

sentences.en: It is only a hobby, not a life or death struggle.
sentences.cn: 这只是一项爱好，不需要拼死拼活地努力。

sentences.en: It was a crime of espionage and carried the death penalty.
sentences.cn: 这是间谍罪，应判死刑。

sentences.en: It's going to be the death knell of the red deer.
sentences.cn: 这将导致马鹿的灭绝。

sentences.en: Police believe the killer punched her to death with his bare hands.
sentences.cn: 警方认为她是被凶手活活用拳头打死的。

sentences.en: Since her death, she has become a cult figure.
sentences.cn: 她死后成了部分人狂热崇拜的偶像。

sentences.en: The bill provides for the automatic review of all death sentences.
sentences.cn: 该法案规定所有死刑判决都要自动接受审核。

sentences.en: the craze for cycling shorts is dying a death.
sentences.cn: 骑车短裤的热潮快结束了。

sentences.en: The latest bombing is the death of all our hopes.
sentences.cn: 最近的炸弹爆炸事件使我们所有的希望都化为乌有。

sentences.en: The police say his death was an accident, officially at least.
sentences.cn: 警方说他的死是个意外，起码官方消息如此。

sentences.en: The tax increase sounded the death knell for the business.
sentences.cn: 税赋的增加为这个企业敲响了丧钟。

sentences.en: These regulations could spell the death (= lead to the end ) of the American car industry.
sentences.cn: 这些规定可能会毁掉美国的汽车工业。

sentences.en: you'll be the death of me with all your questions.
sentences.cn: 你那么多问题要把我问死了。

words.tran_cn: 无生命的；呆板的；废弃了的
致命的；非常的；死一般的
死；死一样的状态；无精打采
死，死亡；枯萎；失去活力（die的ing形式）
变得如死一般；失去活力

phrases.tran_cn: 比死还不济的遭遇（尤指受诱奸或强奸）

phrases.phrase: a matter of life and death

phrases.tran_cn: ［常作夸张或幽默用法］置…于死地
黑死病（14 世纪蔓延欧亚两洲的鼠疫）
死亡骑士（网络游戏中的角色）
寿终，因年老(或患病)而死

phrases.phrase: like death warmed up (或 北美

phrases.tran_cn: 正常死亡，自然死亡（指病死或老死，区别于意外伤害造成的死亡）
心脏性猝死；突然心脏死
n. 猝死；突然死亡；[体]突然死亡法（决赛中的一分或一球定胜负法）

phrases.phrase: till (或 until) death us do part

trans.tran_en: a creature that looks like a human  skeleton  , used in paintings, stories etc to represent the fact that people die
